mapper.sql:
t1.ID id,
t1.NAME "name",
t1.NAME name,
t1.name_cn nameCn, t1.LAYER_TYPE layerType, t1.FEATURE_TYPE featureType, t1.ADD_FLAG addFlag, t1.LAYER_TABLE layerTable, t1.PARAM_ID paramId, t1.IS_PROXY isProxy, t1.IS_EXTERNAL isExternal, t1.PROXY_URL proxyUrl, t1.VECTOR_LAYER_ID vectorLayerId, t1.EXTENT extent,
TO_CHAR(NVL(t1.DATA,'{}')) data,
IFNULL(t1.DATA,'{}') data,
coalesce(t1.DATA,'{}') "data",

t1.ID id, t1.applyItemId applyItemId,
t1.name "name",
t1.name name,
t1.handle handle, t1.code code, t1.success success,
TO_CHAR(t1.processTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') processTime
date_format(t1.processTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') processTime
TO_CHAR(t1.processTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') processTime

f.ID id, f.SUFFIX suffix, f.NAMEid nameId, f.ORIGINAL_FILENAME originalFilename, f.FILE_SIZE fileSize, f.IS_ACTIVE isActive, f.DIRID dirId, f.CREATORUSERNAME creatorUserName,
NVL(to_char(f.CREATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') createTime,
IFNULL(date_format(f.CREATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '') createTime,
to_char(f.CREATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') createTime,
f.ENCODING "encoding"
f.ENCODING encoding
mapper.select:
SELECT h1.ID,
h1.NAME "name",
h1.NAME name,
h1.nameCn, h1.layerType, h1.layerTable, h1.paramId, h1.isProxy, h1.isExternal, h1.proxyUrl,
h1.DATA "data",
h1.DATA data,
h1.createTime,
h1.OWNER "owner",
h1.OWNER owner,
h1.illustration, h1.picture,
string_agg(h1.tagId, ',') AS tagId,
WM_CONCAT(h1.tagId) AS tagId,
h1.applyStatus, h1.completed, h1.applyTime
FROM( SELECT p1.ID id,
p1.NAME "name",
p1.NAME name,
p1.nameCn nameCn, p1.layerType layerType, p1.layerTable layerTable, p1.paramId paramId, p1.isProxy isProxy, p1.isExternal isExternal, p1.proxyUrl proxyUrl,
IFNULL(p1.DATA,'{}') data,
TO_CHAR(NVL(p1.DATA,'{}')) data,
coalesce(p1.DATA,'{}') "data",
p1.create_time createTime,
p1.owner "owner",
p1.owner owner,
p1.illustration illustration, p1.picture picture, r1.tagId as tagId, e1.currentProcessStatus applyStatus, e1.completed completed,
date_format(e1.applyTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') applyTime
to_char(e1.applyTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') applyTime
FROM AG_TAGLAYER r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
m1.create_time, m1.illustration, m1.owner, m1.picture FROM AG_LAYER t1 INNER JOIN AG_METADATA m1 ON m1.id = t1.metadata_id )p1 ON p1.id = r1.layerId
LEFT JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM e1 ON e1.layerid = r1.layerId AND e1.loginName = #{loginName} AND e1.completed = '0'
INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM e1 ON e1.layerid = r1.layerId AND e1.loginName = #{loginName} AND e1.completed = '0'
) h1 WHERE h1.isProxy = '1' AND h1.isExternal = '1'
AND (h1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%') OR h1.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%'))
AND h1.tagId = #{tagId}
AND h1.applyStatus = #{applyStatus}
GROUP BY h1.id, h1.name, h1.nameCn, h1.layerType, h1.layerTable, h1.paramId, h1.isProxy, h1.isExternal, h1.proxyUrl, h1.data, h1.createTime, h1.owner, h1.illustration, h1.picture, h1.applyStatus, h1.completed,h1.applyTime ORDER BY h1.applyTime, h1.createTime
select t.* from (select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.APPLYTIME desc) rw from AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM a where a.layerId = #{layerId} AND a.loginName = #{loginName} ) t where t.rw = 1

SELECT
FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLYPROCESS t1 WHERE t1.applyItemId = #{applyItemId} ORDER BY t1.processTime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM( id, applicant, layerId, loginName, applyFor, secrecy, obtainWay, obtainWayDes, validityDate, workUnit, applicantIdCard, workAddress, applicantMobile, CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS, SERIALNO,APPLYTIME, IP ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicant}, #{layerId}, #{loginName}, #{applyFor}, #{secrecy}, #{obtainWay}, #{obtainWayDesc}, #{validityDate}, #{workUnit}, #{workAddress}, #{applicantIDCard}, #{applicantMobile}, #{currentProcessStatus}, #{serialNo},
#{applyTime,
to_date(#{applyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
to_timestamp(#{applyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
#{ip} )

INSERT INTO AG_OPENMAP_APPLYPROCESS(id,applyItemId,name,processTime,code,handle,success) VALUES (#{id}, #{applyItemId}, #{name},
#{processTime},
to_date(#{processTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
to_timestamp(#{processTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
#{code}, #{handle}, #{success})

INSERT INTO AG_OPENMAP_ATTACHFILE(ID, SUFFIX, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, FILE_SIZE, IS_ACTIVE, CREATETIME, ENCODING, DIRID, APPLYITEMID, NAMEID) VALUES (#{id}, #{suffix}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{isActive},
#{createTime},
to_date(#{createTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
to_timestamp(#{createTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
#{encoding}, #{dirId}, #{applyItemId}, #{nameId})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_AUDITLIST t1 WHERE 1=1
AND t1.auditor = #{loginName}
AND t1.serialNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{serialNo}), '%')
AND t1.applicant LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{applicant}), '%')
AND t1.layerName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%')
AND t1.auditStatus LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{auditStatus}), '%')

SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM t1
WHERE t1.serialNo = #{serialNo}

SELECT
t2.create_time createTime,
t2.owner "owner",
t2.owner owner,
t2.illustration illustration, t2.picture picture FROM AG_LAYER t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN AG_METADATA t2 ON t1.metadata_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_proxy = '1' AND t1.is_external = '1' AND t1.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_AUDITLIST t1
WHERE t1.serialNo = #{serialNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE AG_OPENMAP_AUDITLIST SET auditStatus = #{auditStatus}, auditor = #{auditor}, opinion = #{auditor} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM SET currentProcessStatus = #{currentProcessStatus}, proxyURL = #{proxyURL}, auditor = #{auditor} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM SET currentProcessStatus = #{currentProcessStatus}, applicant = #{applicant}, loginName = #{loginName}, secrecy = #{secrecy}, obtainWay = #{obtainWay}, validityDate = #{validityDate}, workUnit = #{workUnit}, workAddress = #{workAddress}, applicantIDCard = #{applicantIDCard}, applicantMobile = #{applicantMobile},
applyTime = #{applyTime},
applyTime = to_date(#{applyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
applyTime = to_timestamp(#{applyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),
applyFor = #{applyFor}, proxyURL = #{proxyURL}, completed = #{completed} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM AG_OPENMAP_ATTACHFILE f WHERE f.applyItemId = #{applyItemId}
mapper.update: UPDATE AG_OPENMAP_AUDITLIST SET applicant = #{applicant}, auditor = #{auditor}, auditStatus = #{auditStatus}, applyTime = #{applyTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AG_OPENMAP_CARTITEM ( id, layerId, loginName, layerName, thumbNail ) VALUES (#{id}, #{layerId}, #{loginName}, #{layerName}, #{thumbNail})
INSERT INTO ag_openmap_applyitem_layer( applyItemId, layerId, loginName ) VALUES (#{applyItemId}, #{layerId},#{loginName})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.PROXY_URL FROM AG_LAYER t1 WHERE t1.id = #{layerId}
SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM t1 WHERE t1.loginName = #{loginName}

SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLYITEM t1 WHERE t1.LAYERID IN
#{layerId}

SELECT b.ID DIR_LAYER_ID, a.* FROM AG_LAYER a INNER JOIN AG_DIR_LAYER b on a.ID = b.LAYER_ID AND a.IS_PROXY = '1' AND a.IS_EXTERNAL = '1' WHERE 1=1
AND b.DIR_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM AG_DIR WHERE XPATH LIKE CONCAT(#{xpath}, '%') AND PARENT_ID != 'root')
AND (a.NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%') OR a.NAME_CN like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}), '%'))

SELECT c.DIR_LAYER_ID, d.CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM c INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLY d ON d.ID = c.APPLY_ID WHERE APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{applicantLoginName} AND (CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS =0 or (CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS=1 and CEIL(sysdate - AUDIT_TIME) <= to_number(VALIDITYDATE)))
SELECT b.ID DIR_LAYER_ID, a.* FROM AG_LAYER a INNER JOIN AG_DIR_LAYER b on a.ID = b.LAYER_ID AND a.IS_PROXY = '1' AND a.IS_EXTERNAL = '1' WHERE b.ID = #{dirLayerId}

SELECT a.* FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY a INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM b ON a.ID = b.APPLY_ID WHERE a.APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{applicantLoginName} AND b.DIR_LAYER_ID = #{dirLayerId} ORDER BY APPLYTIME DESC
SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY WHERE APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{applicantLoginName}

SELECT
FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLYPROCESS WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId} ORDER BY processTime
SELECT b.DIR_ID as dirId, count(*) as layerCount FROM AG_LAYER a INNER JOIN AG_DIR_LAYER b on a.ID = b.LAYER_ID AND a.IS_PROXY = '1' AND a.IS_EXTERNAL = '1' GROUP BY b.DIR_ID

SELECT dirId, count(*) as layerCount FROM (select distinct b.ID as dirLayerId, b.DIR_ID as dirId FROM AG_LAYER a INNER JOIN AG_DIR_LAYER b on a.ID = b.LAYER_ID AND a.IS_PROXY = '1' AND a.IS_EXTERNAL = '1' INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM c on b.ID = c.DIR_LAYER_ID INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLY d on c.APPLY_ID = d.ID WHERE d.APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{loginName}) t GROUP BY dirId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AG_OPENMAP_APPLY( ID, APPLICANT, CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS, APPLYDOCID, APPLICANT_LOGINNAME, SECRECY, OBTAINWAY, VALIDITYDATE, WORKUNIT, APPLICANTIDCARD, WORKADDRESS, APPLICANTMOBILE, APPLYTIME, APPLYFOR, OBTAINWAYDES, IP, AUDITOR_LOGINNAME, AUDITOR_USERNAME, AUDIT_OPINION, AUDIT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{applicant}, #{currentProcessStatus}, #{applyDocId}, #{applicantLoginName}, #{secrecy}, #{obtainWay}, #{validityDate}, #{workUnit}, #{applicantIdCard}, #{workAddress}, #{applicantMobile}, #{applyTime}, #{applyFor}, #{obtainWayDesc}, #{ip}, #{auditorLoginName}, #{auditorUserName}, #{auditOpinion}, #{auditTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
SELECT d.NAME FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM b INNER JOIN AG_DIR_LAYER c ON b.DIR_LAYER_ID = c.ID INNER JOIN AG_LAYER d ON c.LAYER_ID = d.ID WHERE b.APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_ATTACHFILE WHERE APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_ATTACHFILE WHERE APPLY_ID IN
#{item}
mapper.update:
UPDATE AG_OPENMAP_APPLY
APPLICANT = #{applicant},
CURRENTPROCESSSTATUS = #{currentProcessStatus},
APPLYDOCID = #{applyDocId},
APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{applicantLoginName},
SECRECY = #{secrecy},
OBTAINWAY = #{obtainWay},
VALIDITYDATE = #{validityDate},
WORKUNIT = #{workUnit},
APPLICANTIDCARD = #{applicantIdCard},
WORKADDRESS = #{workAddress},
APPLICANTMOBILE = #{applicantMobile},
APPLYTIME = #{applyTime},
APPLYFOR = #{applyFor},
OBTAINWAYDES = #{obtainWayDesc},
IP = #{ip}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AG_OPENMAP_CARTITEM WHERE loginName = #{loginName}
SELECT b.* FROM AG_OPENMAP_APPLY a INNER JOIN AG_OPENMAP_APPLY_ITEM b ON a.ID = b.APPLY_ID WHERE a.APPLICANT_LOGINNAME = #{applicantLoginName}
